name: The Beholder's Prison
description:
PHOTO-SENSITIVITY WARNING: FLASHING LIGHTS.

This was the first game I ever made. Well, the first complete, original game.

An attempt to squeeze the most out of the littlest.

Credits:

Cave audio is from somewhere I don't remember. If you know where, please tell me so I can give credit.

Ending Music:

from https://filmmusic.io

"Gymnopedie No. 1" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)

Me: Everything else
